scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, likely Saint John the Baptist, stands in a landscape holding an open book. He wears a reddish-orange tunic and a brown mantle. To his right, a brown animal, possibly a lamb or a deer, is lying down. The background depicts rolling green hills and a distant city with buildings and a body of water. The scene is rendered in a stylized, miniature format, typical of illuminated manuscripts.
